snippet.title: Gravity Ghost PS4 Launch Trailer - Available August 6 on the PlayStation Store
snippet.description:
Surf the night sky. Careen through the cosmos. Find the fox. Don’t miss this genre-defying journey through the heart of the galaxy.

When a ghost girl’s best friend goes missing, she’ll turn the whole universe upside down to find him. But the story she discovers might just be her own.

Set in a beautiful hand-painted world, Gravity Ghost is a planetary platformer where orbiting is an art form. In more than 100 dizzying levels, you’ll put your aerial skills to the test against planets that bounce, break, splash, spin, repel, and more. 

Winner of Paste Magazine’s #1 Best Videogame Soundtrack of the year, Gravity Ghost is filled with 100% original tracks by Ben Prunty, composer of FTL.

Animated in a charming storybook style, and voiced by Emmy Award-winning actress Ashly Burch (Horizon Zero Dawn, Life is Strange), and voice-over artist Logan Cunningham (Bastion, Transistor), Gravity Ghost is a surprisingly human story about how love, like gravity, invisibly holds us together even as life threatens to pull us apart.


NEW in the Deluxe Edition:

• NEW Girl Constellation with 13 all-new challenge levels
- Use all your skills: powerups, terraforming, and puzzle solving
- New musical 'Clovers' 
- 3 Bonus Tracks from the game's soundtrack - now in the game's challenge levels

• Playable Voy the Fox
- Superpowered jump, more challenging air control
- Unlocked by beating the game

• DualShock(tm) Light Bar support
- E.g. Magic Elements, and other important moments
